bill_title: to revise the procedure that determines the value of agricultural property.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the procedure that determines the value of agricultural property. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 10-6-33.8 be amended to read as follows: 10-6-33.8. The median sales to assessment ratio of all real property may not be less than eighty-five percent or more than one hundred percent. The value of agricultural property based on the soil classifications in § 10-6-33.7 may not exceed the value of that land based upon the sales ratio by more than three percent without the approval of a joint hearing before the local and county review board. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
